content.question: If <math alttext="f of x equals, 12 times x raised to the one half power, plus 3 x, plus the fraction 32 over x, end fraction, plus 5" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>f</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>12</mn><msup><mi>x</mi><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mfrac><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mn>1</mn></mstyle><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mn>2</mn></mstyle></mfrac></mstyle></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>3</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mn>32</mn><mi>x</mi></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mn>5</mn></math>, then <math alttext="f prime of 4 equals" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>f</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>â€²</mo></mrow></msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>4</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo></mrow></math>
